description.raw:
I see some warnings when building ign-math on windows 8 with Visual Studio 2012. This fixes them.
~~~
[ 38%] Building CXX object src/CMakeFiles/ignition-math2.dir/Kmeans.cc.obj
Kmeans.cc
C:\Users\scpeters\ws\gazebo\ign-math\src\Kmeans.cc(117) : warning C4018: '<' : signed/unsigned mismatch
C:\Users\scpeters\ws\gazebo\ign-math\src\Kmeans.cc(123) : warning C4018: '<' : signed/unsigned mismatch
C:\Users\scpeters\ws\gazebo\ign-math\src\Kmeans.cc(130) : warning C4018: '<' : signed/unsigned mismatch
C:\Users\scpeters\ws\gazebo\ign-math\src\Kmeans.cc(144) : warning C4018: '<' : signed/unsigned mismatch
C:\Users\scpeters\ws\gazebo\ign-math\src\Kmeans.cc(162) : warning C4018: '<' : signed/unsigned mismatch
~~~

They [don't show up in Jenkins](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/ign-math/job/ignition_math-any-devel-windows7-amd64/7/) though. Maybe because it's using Windows 7?

I know we're in freeze mode, but I'm going to forget about little things like this unless I make the pull request.

title: Fix windows 8 warnings
